text: The 1944 Rhode Island gubernatorial election was held on November 7, 1944. Incumbent Democrat J. Howard McGrath defeated Republican nominee Norman D. MacLeod with 60.65% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== *J. Howard McGrath, Democratic *Norman D. MacLeod, Republican ===Results=== ==References== 1944 Rhode Island Gubernatorial
title: 1944 Rhode Island gubernatorial election
